snippet.title: VR Flight Simulator [Android & iOS] - soon: GearVR & Oculus Go
snippet.description:
NOW available for iOS:
https://itunes.apple.com/gr/app/v-r-flight-simulator/id1283068616?mt=8

ANDROID:  
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.panosDrak.VR_FlightSim

-----------------------------------------------------------


Simply, the best and most complete VR Flight Simulator on the app store for its price!

- Want to feel how it's like flying inside the cockpit of a real cockpit, by simply using your smartphone?
- Want to interact with many buttons and switches and perform basic operations?
- Want a realistic flying experience with realistic physics, sound effects and graphics?

With this flight simulator app, all of the above can be done!  Watch the video and see for yourself.

Features
--------
- Realistic physics  (real-time aerodynamic calculations)

- Interact with cockpit
 - Start/shut down engines
 - Control thrust amount
 - Flaps

- Ground controls (steering, brakes, pushback)

- Flight controls (roll and pitch)

- Graphics
 - ultra-realistic Airbus 320 cockpit
 - realistic airport environment (buildings, taxiways, parking area with jetways, runways)
 - realistic terrain and sea
 - about 2.500 square kilometer area


- Realistic sound effects
 - ATC chatter
 - Engine sound effects (spool up, reverse thrust, idle)
 - other sound effects
 - GPWS callouts

- Cameras
 - cockpit
 - wing view

- Tutorial (short tutorial to help start the aircraft and perform basic functions)



IMPORTANT NOTES!!
=================
- The app can be used with both VR and normal mode. VR mode requires a compatible headset, such as the Google Cardboard or equivalent.
- If you don't have a VR headset, the game still functions the same way!
- Due to realistic graphics, smartphones with low processing power may have trouble running the application at a high frame rate.  
- Application has been tested and runs smoothly (50-60 FPS) on phones such as the Samsung Galaxy S6, S7, Note 4 or equivalent.
